caption.p: Effects of Rosemary essential oil on the inhibition of biofilm formation of Staphylococcus epidermidis (prevention) expressed as biofilm inhibition (%) ( a) and on the reduction of established biofilm of Staphylococcus epidermidis expressed as biofilm eradication (%) ( b). The results are presented as means ± SD of three independent experiments. .* p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01 or *** p < 0.001 versus control values
